inclusion.criterion: Severe AS defined as aortic valve area (AVA) ≤1 cm2, AND Transvalvular maximum velocity (Vmax) ≥3.5 m/s AND AS severity evaluated severe by a heart valve team conference.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Considered to be asymptomatic (estimated by a consultant in cardiology)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Considered to be candidate for AVR (transcatheter AVR/surgical AVR)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Sign of increased LV filling pressures18 or reduced longitudinal LV systolic function
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Left atrial volume index (LAVi) > 34 ml/m2; OR ratio of early diastolic peak mitral inflow velocity (E) to early mitral annulus diastolic velocity (e') ratio E/e'avg>13; OR Threefold elevation in NT-proBNP compared to the upper expected age and gender value. OR GLS>-15
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Very severe AS defined as Vmax>5 m/s.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant severe valvular disease other than AS
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%. He underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath and showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
